channel.title: Help with berkys client
channel.description: well it runs fine and all but i get a very annoying error and it crashes the client here is the error: [code]Error: Class106:89 Class68_Sub13_Sub31:87 Class68_Sub19:165 Class68_Sub19:330 Cl ass68_Sub20:57 Class68_Sub13_Sub25:108 client:2044 Applet_Sub1:413 Applet_Sub1:1 57 java.lang.Thread.run | java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 30975 error_game_crash Shutdown complete - clean:true [/code] can anyone please help?

item.title: Help with berkys client
item.dc:creator: @mrslayer mrslayer
item.description:
@mrslayer wrote:

well it runs fine and all but i get a very annoying error and it crashes the client here is the error:

Error: Class106:89 Class68_Sub13_Sub31:87 Class68_Sub19:165 Class68_Sub19:330 Cl ass68_Sub20:57 Class68_Sub13_Sub25:108 client:2044 Applet_Sub1:413 Applet_Sub1:1 57 java.lang.Thread.run | java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 30975 error_game_crash Shutdown complete - clean:true
can anyone please help?

Read full topic
